channel.title: Homes on Pierce Donovan
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pierce Donovan

item.description: About Me I’m an environmental economist that enjoys applying ideas from economics, physics, ecology, and mathematics in my research. Most of my work focuses on the structural modeling of bioeconomic systems. My current project involves the integrated management of endangered species and hydropower generation on the Colorado River. I spend most of my time learning about new things. The most recent books I’ve read are about urban planning, the future of energy, and fly fishing.
